6d5a7a0b7c4fd4d86ed3eb6b675c88d5 (12:33): No signal sent, unless the parent is a session leader.

6d5a7a0b7c4fd4d86ed3eb6b675c88d5 (12:38): polpak: http://www.win.tue.nl/~aeb/linux/lk/lk-10.html "Orphaned process groups" might have some hints :-\
